chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f

Premises:
notH = fol.notH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
System = fol.System LNN : Type
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
folLogic.Axm : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), mem (fol.Formula L) T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folLogic.sysExtend : forall (L : Language) (T U : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), Included (fol.Formula L) T U -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L U f
folLogic.sysWeaken : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f
folLogic.contradiction : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
folLogic.impE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g -> folProof.SysPrf L T f
folLogic.impI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T g) f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L g f)
ssrbool.sub_mem = fun (T : Type) (mp1 mp2 : ssrbool.mem_pred T) => forall x : T, is_true (ssrbool.in_mem x mp1) -> is_true (ssrbool.in_mem x mp2) : forall T : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T -> ssrbool.mem_pred T -> Prop Arguments ssrbool.sub_mem {T}%type_scope
ssrbool.sub_in3 : forall (T : Type) (d d' : ssrbool.mem_pred T) (P : T -> T -> T -> Prop), ssrbool.sub_mem d d' -> forall Ph : ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x y z : T, P x y z), ssrbool.prop_in3 d' (P:=P) Ph -> ssrbool.prop_in3 d (P:=P) Ph
ssrbool.rel_of_simpl = fun (T : Type) (sr : ssrbool.simpl_rel T) (x : T) => ssrbool.PredOfSimpl.coerce (T:=T) (sr x) : forall T : Type, ssrbool.simpl_rel T -> ssrbool.rel T Arguments ssrbool.rel_of_simpl {T}%type_scope sr x / : rename
ssrbool.subrel : forall T : Type, ssrbool.rel T -> ssrbool.rel T -> Prop
ssrbool.relU = fun (T : Type) (r1 r2 : ssrbool.rel T) => ssrbool.SimplRel ((fun (r3 r4 : ssrbool.rel T) (x y : T) => (r3 x y || r4 x y)%bool) r1 r2) : forall T : Type, ssrbool.rel T -> ssrbool.rel T -> ssrbool.simpl_rel T Arguments ssrbool.relU {T}%type_scope
Variant mem_pred (T : Type) : Type := Mem : ssrbool.pred T -> ssrbool.mem_pred T Arguments ssrbool.mem_pred _%type_scope Arguments ssrbool.Mem [T]%type_scope
ssrfun.can_inj : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> ssrfun.injective f
ssrfun.pcan_inj : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> option aT), ssrfun.pcancel f g -> ssrfun.injective f
ssrbool.rel = fun T : Type => T -> ssrbool.pred T : Type -> Type Arguments ssrbool.rel _%type_scope
ssrfun.can_pcan : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> ssrfun.pcancel f (fun y : rT => Some (g y))
Variant phantom (T : Type) (p : T) : Prop := Phantom : ssreflect.phantom T p Arguments ssreflect.phantom _%type_scope Arguments ssreflect.Phantom _%type_scope
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
BinInt.Z.eqf = fun f g : BinNums.Z -> bool => forall n : BinNums.Z, f n = g n : (BinNums.Z -> bool) -> (BinNums.Z -> bool) -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
ssrbool.subrelUr : forall (T : Type) (r1 r2 : ssrbool.rel T), ssrbool.subrel (T:=T) r2 (ssrbool.rel_of_simpl (ssrbool.relU r1 r2))
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
BinInt.Z.le_ind : forall A : BinNums.Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : BinNums.Z, A n -> (forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m -> A (BinInt.Z.succ m)) -> forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m
Nat.right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
ssrbool.prop_in3 : forall T1 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> T1 -> T1 -> Prop, ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x y z : T1, P x y z) -> Prop
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
projT1 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type), {x : A & P x} -> A
primRec.PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, primRec.PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 primRec.succFunc -> P 0 primRec.zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (primRec.projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : primRec.PrimRecs n m) (h : primRec.PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (primRec.composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : primRec.PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : primRec.PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRec.primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : primRec.PrimRec n), P n p
Inductive PrimRec : nat -> Set := succFunc : primRec.PrimRec 1 | zeroFunc : primRec.PrimRec 0 | projFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> primRec.PrimRec n | composeFunc : forall n m : nat, primRec.PrimRecs n m -> primRec.PrimRec m -> primRec.PrimRec n | primRecFunc : forall n : nat, primRec.PrimRec n -> primRec.PrimRec (S (S n)) -> primRec.PrimRec (S n) with PrimRecs : nat -> nat ->...-> primRec.PrimRecs n (S m) Arguments primRec.PrimRec _%nat_scope Arguments primRec.projFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRec.composeFunc (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRec.primRecFunc _%nat_scope Arguments primRec.PrimRecs (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments primRec.PRnil _%nat_scope Arguments primRec.PRcons (_ _)%nat_scope
ssrfun.injective : forall rT aT : Type, (aT -> rT) -> Prop
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
RingMicromega.cneqb : forall C : Type, (C -> C -> bool) -> C -> C -> bool
SRsub : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R
ssrfun.cancel : forall rT aT : Type, (aT -> rT) -> (rT -> aT) -> Prop

```coq
intros T f H.
apply impI.
apply impE with (notH (notH f)).
- apply sysExtend with T.
  + intros x Hx. apply ssrbool.sub_in3 with (Phantom _ (fun x y z => SysPrf x y z)).
    * intros x y z. apply contradiction.
    * apply folLogic.contradiction. apply Axm. assumption. apply Axm. assumption.
- apply sysWeaken with (notH f).
  + apply Axm. assumption.
Qed.
Qed.```
